message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, Charles and Donald are both ancestors of Doris. Charles is an ancestor of Doris through the chain: Charles → Jesse → Heather → Lori → Rebecca → Debra → Beverly → Donna → Douglas → Richard → James → Brandon → Terry → Jordan → Andrea → Judith → Carol → Gary → Jacqueline → Teresa → Dylan → Susan → Frank → Dorothy → Megan → Jeremy → Joseph → Jacob → Gerald → Doris. Donald is an ancestor of Doris through the chain: Donald → Michael → Scott → Brian → Christine → Sandra → Denise → Zachary → Margaret → Melissa → Marilyn → Patrick → Ethan → John → Steven → Ralph → Christopher → Peter → Adam → Olivia → Stephanie → Gloria → Katherine → Julia → Danielle → Kathryn → Bryan → Carl → Brenda → Jeffrey → Christian → Anna → Edward → Hannah → Kenneth → Alexander → Jose → Ann → Eugene → Jack → Larry → Victoria → Madison → Robert → Paul → Barbara → Sophia → Pamela → Austin → Samantha → Angela → Elijah → Wayne → Willie → Virginia → Kayla → Bruce → Joe → Gregory → Timothy → Raymond → Jerry → Lauren → Joshua → Emma → Nicole → Arthur → Matthew → Janet → Jessica → Judy → Sean → Anthony → Martha → Vincent → Jonathan → Theresa → Gabriel → Justin → Mark → Cheryl → Samuel → Grace → David → Maria → Kathleen → Bobby → Sara → Amanda → Joan → Roger → Nancy → Rachel → Deborah → Catherine → Mason → Joyce → Andrew → Doris. Since both chains lead to Doris, Charles and Donald share a common descendant.

<ANSWER>4</ANSWER>
